message: I've seen talk of an iPhone app but what about a mobile web version too?
I, too, would like a mobile site and an iPhone app. Love this service!
yes a mobile site is on the roadmap

I would really like to see a mobile site, especially for when I get emails on my BlackBerry about new topics that seem interesting. Apps are good, but a mobile site will allow access across any platform, so hopefully they prioritize it.
